attributes.action: Change the law on ivf for women with pcos
attributes.additional_details: Change the criteria of wieght allowances for all woman with pcos
attributes.background: To change the law on ivf because women with pcos can not lose wieght as pcos make you gain wieght and to stop labeling us because of our weight gain

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a clinical decision for the NHS.
